entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Candiac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
